title: Kled is disgusting right now and needs some serious attention!!
body: {{champion:240}}  is by far one of the most broken champs in the game he is legit unkillable he builds {{item:3812}}  and{{item:3026}} and done he's unkillable his passive restores him so much health  (reaching even 3000+  hp restored with health items) while doing insane dmg with items such as deaths dance a nd Ga imo his passive needs to be nerfed as well as his w Violent Tendencies damage of 6.5% target max hp to 5% I'd love to see you guys counter argument because at the moment I just can't see how Kled is balanced.

replies.body: You won't allow counter argument, you are just listing off stats, you know if you do this for any champion, they all seem broken right?

in the game with kled that you're venting about you're playing jhin.

Kled is resistant to burst which is rare for bruisers because of his passive, also hes meant to be the tankier side of the skirmishers as he has no healing tricks or in combat shields. and only has on good reliable cc and auto attacks.
I wish he was that broken. Before Skarrl even goes off screen, I tend to get bursted down in that instant.

Winrate tells tales.

It says he is hardly broken.
